title: MODERN 2/2 TOWNHOME IN A FANTASTIC COMMUNITY, WAITING FOR YOU!
posting_body: Come and see this modern townhome in the much-desired Communication Hills community!
Dark hardwood flooring provides a warm and classy ambiance to this charming abode, while high ceilings add elegance!
Natural light bathes the interiors through large glass windows with transoms.
Light-colored walls and ceilings with recessed lighting create a refreshing space!
Upgraded kitchen features quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a large island!
White shaker cabinets and drawers offer lots of storage space.
Plus, you’ll also have a walk-in pantry with built-in shelves!
Primary bedroom enjoys a walk-in closet and an ensuite full bath with a glass-enclosed shower, double-sink vanity, and a separate toilet.
Secondary room has a built-in closet and easy access to a full bath with a shower-and-tub combo.
This home comes with in-unit laundry, water softener, water filter, water heater, and smart thermostat for climate control!
This home is in a peaceful community in the heart of Silicon Valley!
Walking distance to the community park and hiking trails, nearby shops and restaurants, and just a few miles away from downtown, major tech companies, and San Jose Airport.
